author: James Mackintosh
title: Why Should Markets Care About a Paltry $150 Billion Trade War?
text:
Sometimes it is worth asking stupid questions. Here is one: Why should we care about President Donald Trump’s threatened 25% tariffs on $150 billion in trade with China?
“Duh, tariffs are bad,” would be the response from anyone convinced of the benefits of trade—and that is almost everyone who has studied economics—as well as anyone who has read anything about the Great Depression.
Yet...
